name: ai-disaster-management-backend
description: Secure, modular, production-ready Node.js + Express + MongoDB backend with JWT auth, roles (Admin, Operator, Public), Socket.IO real-time alerts, and ML integration hooks.

scripts.local: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend && npm run dev
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.render-build: npm install && cd frontend && npm install --production=false && npm run build
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo Setup complete! Run 'npm run local' to start development server.
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d
